data.heading: Land animals
data.rubric: Click on each picture to know more about land animals.
data.text: Land animals have bodies that help them to live on land.
Most land animals have legs which help them to move around.
Most land animals have hair or fur to keep them warm.
Some land animals can move very fast.
Some land animals are very slow.
data.Caption: tiger
bear
cheetah
snail
